metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11683 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
There is a reachable assertion in the Internal::TiffReader::visitDirectory function in tiffvisitor.cpp of Exiv2 0.26 that will lead to a remote denial of service attack via crafted input.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11683` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.25-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.2
libexiv2-14 - 0.25-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> first commit skips the issue, third commit is actual fix.

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.25-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.2').
